/* com.ceragem.crm.mem.dao.CrmStoreBasDao.selectStoreBasSearchList */ SELECT STOR_NO, STOR_NM, TEL_NO, STOR_STATUS_CD, DISTRCT_CD, DISTRCT_CD AS DISTRCT_NM, REG_DT, NVL(MEMBER_CNT, 0) AS MEMBER_CNT FROM(
) sTB LEFT JOIN( SELECT RCMD_STOR_NO, COUNT(RCMD_STOR_NO) AS MEMBER_CNT FROM CRM_CUST_BAS GROUP BY RCMD_STOR_NO ) cTB ON(sTB.STOR_NO = cTB.RCMD_STOR_NO) ORDER BY STOR_NO DESC

/* com.ceragem.crm.mem.dao.CrmStoreBasDao.selectStoreBasInfo */ SELECT STOR_NO /*매장번호*/ , STOR_NM /*매장명*/ , TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT /*등록일시*/ , STOR_STATUS_CD /*상태코드*/ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', TEL_NO, '') AS TEL_NO /*전화번호*/ , CASE WHEN STA_HOUR IS NULL OR END_HOUR IS NULL THEN '' ELSE( SUBSTR(STA_HOUR,0,2) ||':'|| SUBSTR(STA_HOUR, 3,2) ||' ~ '|| SUBSTR(END_HOUR,0,2) ||':'|| SUBSTR(END_HOUR, 3,2) ) END AS USE_HOUR /*영업시간*/ , ZIP_CD /*우편번호*/ , ADDR_1_CTNTS /*주소1내용*/ , DAMO.DECRYPT_VAR_B64('AES_256', ADDR_2_CTNTS, '') AS ADDR_2_CTNTS /*주소2내용*/ , MEMO_CTNTS /*메모*/ , LATI /*위도*/ , LONGI /*경도*/ , STOR_CHL_CD /*브랜드코드*/ , STOR_TYPE_CD /*채널코드*/ , STOR_DIV_CD /*운영코드*/ , POS_STOR_NO /*POS매장번호*/ , DISTRCT_CD /*지역코드*/ , REG_CHL_CD /*등록채널코드*/ FROM CRM_STOR_BAS WHERE STOR_NO = #{storNo}
